snippet.title: Ravenswatch | Romeo & Juliet Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Ravenswatch roster grows! ❤️ Romeo & Juliet, the legendary star-crossed lovers, enter the nightmare as a duo hero, bringing a unique and deadly combat style to the battlefield. Will their bond be strong enough to survive the horrors of Reverie?

🔥Two new playable heros - Romeo & Juliet
⚔️ Choose between both characters for strategic gameplay, but you have to play them together
💥 Unleash devastating attacks
🩸 Embrace their tragic fate

This FREE DLC will be available May 2025 on PC, PlayStation®4 & PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch.
-------------------------------
